title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
Hi I got yet another board that does 3 beeps

I missing u7300 missing 19&20 But it seems I have all other signals.
with ram installed Smbus is good I have 1 beep with ram removed. All measurements with ram installed 12800& 10666 tested with both

1-DDRREG_VTTSNS=.75
2-PP1v5_S3=1.5v
3-PP075_S0_DDRVTT=.75
4-GND=0v
5-PPVTTDDR_S3=.75V
6-DDRREG_1v8_VREF=1.8v
7-GND_-DDRREG_SGND=0v
8-DDRREG_FB=1.5v
9-DDRREG_VDDQSNS=1.5v
10-GND
11-DDRREG_DRVL=driver frequency
12-PP5vS3=5v
13-DDRREG_LL=drive frequency
14-DDRREG_DRVH=driver Freuency
15-DDRREG_VBST=5.33v
16-DDRREG_EN=3.3v
17-MEMVTT_EN=3.3v
18-DDRREG_TRIP=.75
19-DDRREG_MODE=0v
20-DDRREG_PGOOD=0v

I check all of Q3200,Q3205,Q3210,Q3215
The only one that stood out as odd is ISOLATE_CPU_MEM_L= 2.5v

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
Did you check each DDR slot by separate?
3 beeps on both ports?
Do you have DDR3 test card?

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
Yes I tested each slot individually both have same issue 1beep with out ram stick and 3 beeps with ram installed 
 Both ram slots pass ram with DDR test card. All DDR test  card illuminate

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: If connections are good, then can be CPU issue.

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
Do you think it’s worth checking CLKE0, CLKE1 or DMI connections for some sort of
Signals or wave forms ? Or just call it quits ? Also thank you for your help

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
If the LEDs patron is correct, then traces and solders are good (to CPU).
You've already posted good voltages for RAM, so internal CPU issue is expected now.

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: Ok thank you 2informatico. May I ask one more question. Would it be better to invest in a ultrasonic or a bga machines? I have purchased at least 6 boards that either have pch or cpu issues. It’s more about trying to rescue what you can. Is it a wise investment ?

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
Replacing BGA CPU is not easy job.
You need good skills and lot of practice to replace PCH, or GPU in Apple boards.

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: There is a way to align that chips? theres no mark on board. thanks in advance

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message:
Must scratch around the chip before remove it.
Carefully, not damaging any trace...

title: 820-3115 3 beeps
message: Niiice tip.. noob of me XD... thanks
